main event: A single saucer-shaped object with small lights and a flash appeared to be falling slowly over Glendale, California.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1 minute, The object was described as saucer-shaped with small lights, The object emitted a flash and appeared to be falling, Conclusions suggest it could be a balloon, aircraft, astronomical, or radar-related, A police officer and other civilians were witnesses.
witness description: a police officer and a civilian, reliable
